message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value, I'm asking for $14,000. I think it's a fair price that reflects the benefits it will bring you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can't justify spending $14,000 on it. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for it.

Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below what I can accept. Let's find a middle ground - how about $12,500? This reflects a considerable discount while still valuing the product fairly.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I'm willing to increase my offer to $11,000. I hope this brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
Bob, I appreciate you moving closer to my valuation.  How about we split the difference and settle on $11,750? This would be a fair compromise for both of us.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. I am willing to pay $11,500 for the product. I hope this proposal helps us move forward.
